attributes.action: alter the dates British Summer Time begins and end in the UK, alter the clocks to change at midnight GMT and ask other countries around the world to do the same.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that British Summer Time should be based on the first week of Spring to the first week of Autumn, i.e. the closest Sunday to March 21 and September 21. Also to move the time BST begins and ends to midnight GMT instead of 1am GMT. And also to get it made universal so that countries in the northern and southern hemisphere start and end their daylight savings time on the same dates and time.
